alert.note: Alert for Gove; Greeley; Logan; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:10AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wichita, southeastern Logan, southeastern Greeley and Gove Counties through 115 AM MDT/215 AM CDT/... At 1210 AM MDT/110 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Park to 10 miles south of Tribune. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Quinter around 115 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 76 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
